backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining data models and CRUD APIs for products, reps, consignments, sales, returns, payouts, adjustments, and settlement periods with ID counters and settlement locking.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that upgrades old state by adding empty adjustments and settlements maps and initializing new ID counters.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing frontend files, components, and test IDs associated with recent settlement-period and adjustment-related features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains short descriptions of each frontend file, summarizing components, pages, utilities, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light/dark theme color tokens using OKLCH and applying global background/foreground styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the root element and bootstrapping the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router configuration wiring all pages, including settlement periods and adjustments, wrapped with theme provider and toaster.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout component providing header, navigation tabs, main content area, and footer for the app.
frontend/src/components/CommissionSettin: Dialog for viewing and editing default commission rates and per-rep overrides with validation and persistence.
Popover-based date range selector allowing users to pick, clear, and apply start/end dates.
Editor for managing line items including product selection, quantity, and optional unit price fields.
frontend/src/components/ProductSelect.ts: Dropdown that loads and displays products for selection, showing names and formatted prices.
frontend/src/components/RepSelect.tsx: Dropdown that loads and displays reps for selection by name.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, login state, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating products, reps, consignments, sales, returns, and related data from the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles, CSS variables for themes, and print-specific formatting rules.
frontend/src/lib/calculations.ts: Implements functions to compute rep balances and inventory levels using sales, returns, payouts, consignments, and product data.
frontend/src/lib/commissionSettings.ts: Manages commission settings with localStorage, including defaults and per‑rep overrides.
frontend/src/lib/csv.ts: Provides CSV generation, downloading utilities, and helpers for formatting dates and currency.
frontend/src/lib/dateUtils.ts: Offers utilities for month boundaries, formatting month-year strings, and retrieving the current month.
frontend/src/lib/settlementLock.ts: Checks whether a date falls within a closed settlement period and formats settlement period dates.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdjustmentsPage.tsx: UI page for listing and creating rep adjustments with validation, dialogs, and form submission.
frontend/src/pages/ConsignmentsPage.tsx: UI page for viewing, filtering, exporting, and adding consignments with settlement lock checks and multi‑item entry.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard displaying rep balances and inventory with date filters, CSV export, and commission settings dialog.
frontend/src/pages/PayoutsPage.tsx: Page to record, filter, and export rep payouts with validation, settlement lock checks, and add‑payout dialog.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Product management page allowing search, creation, listing, and CSV export of products.
frontend/src/pages/RepsPage.tsx: Page for managing sales reps with search, rep creation dialog, and CSV export including commission data.
frontend/src/pages/ReturnsPage.tsx: Page for logging and exporting rep product returns with line‑item editing, filters, and settlement lock enforcement.
frontend/src/pages/SalesPage.tsx: Sales management page that lists sales, filters by date, adds new sales with line items, and exports filtered data to CSV while enforcing settlement-period locks.
frontend/src/pages/SettlementPeriodsPage: UI for creating and closing settlement periods with date validation, listing periods, and locking transactions for closed ranges.
frontend/src/pages/StatementsPage.tsx: Generates monthly printable statements for reps by selecting rep and date range and computing balances, commissions, and related transactions.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, typography, animations, container settings, and plugins for layout and styling.
project_state.json: JSON snapshot describing project version, features, architecture notes, and planned enhancements for the ConsignFlow application.
